New Records: Kagiso Rabada took his 50th wicket in T20I.
Key Match Events: India lost the second T20I in Cuttack to South Africa by 4 wickets.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar took 4 wickets for 13 runs.
Anrich Nortje took 2 wickets for 36 runs.
Wayne Parnell took 1 wicket for 23 runs.
Dwaine Pretorius took 1 wicket for 40 runs.
Keshav Maharaj took 1 wicket for 12 runs.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar dismissed Reeza Hendricks, Dwaine Pretorius, and Rassie van der Dussen.
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won the toss and opted to bowl first.
